title: Unna Vitta Yarum Enaku Illa Song Lyrics From Seema Raja Movie
stanzas:
[ Unna Vitta Yarum Enakilla 
paaru paaru
enna kanden 
naanum unakulla (2)

uravaaga neeyum sera
usurula veesum soora kaathu.
pala nooru koadi aandu
nelavula podavenum koothu

adiye kootta thaandi
parandhuvaa veliyila ] (2)

vaanam - nee nallapadi
vandhu nikka vidiyume vidiyume

boomi - un kannukulla
sonnapadi suzhalume suzhalume

andhi pagal yedhu
unna marandhale
athanaiyum pesa
paththalaiye naale

manase thaangaama
naan un madiyil thoongaama
koyil, mani oasai
nidham ketpen 
rendu vizhiyil

Unna Vitta Yarum Enakilla
paaru paaru
enna kanden 
naanum unakulla (2)

naekkaa  - nee 
kannasaika  kandapadi 
methakkuren methakkuren.

kaaththaa- naan
ulla vandhuu unna sera  
edukkuren edukkuren

oththa nodi neeyum
thalli irunthaale
kannu iva moodi 
poyiduven mele.

kadale kaaichaalum
yezhu malaiye saainjaalum. 
kaapen unna naane
kalangaathe kannumaniye

Unna vitta yarum enakilla
paaru paaru
enna kanden naanum unakulla (2)
